title: Charming 2 bdr, Harvard Sq., ht and hw included,
posting_body: ['CAMBRIDGE – HARVARD SQUARE –', 'Price:', '$3600', 'Available:', '9/1/22.', '2 BEDROOM - 1 BATH', 'Charming 2 bedroom condominium in the heart of vibrant Harvard Square.', 'Galley kitchen with dishwasher.', 'Dining area.', 'Hardwood floors.', 'Faux fireplace.', 'Lovely woodwork.', 'Coin-op laundry in basement.', 'Heat and hot water included in the rent.', 'No pets.', 'Note: Price and availability subject to change without notice.', 'NO PETS -Listing#-181652974', '**NOTE: Price and availability, subject to change, without notice.', '**', 'Century 21 Avon', '1675 Massachusetts Ave.', 'Cambridge, MA 02138', '617-661-8400', 'E-mail: Click "Reply" button above.']
